articleData.blog_content:
"The only thing greater than the power of the mind is the courage of the heart." The courage and intent of the entire team inspired me to join Desire Foundation.

I have always resonated with social work. Desire Foundation allowed me to work with a group of people who are always committed to social justice and have dedicatedly enhanced the well-being and quality of life of individuals who were impacted by social disadvantages.

Initially, I was overwhelmed by the enthusiasm and generosity of the people working here. Every visit, every survey helped me to better myself. I still remember the first survey that I was a part of, we met so many kids who were already in school because of Desire. That day I realized that I was a part of something bigger than all of us and that feeling has helped me go on.

My journey so far has been so rewarding and this was possible just because of the people and their passion for doing something great. Thank you so much, everyone.
